title: 2.4 Master Challenge 3
question: A train is traveling at the rate of 1 km per 1 minute and 30 seconds. If the train continues at this speed, how many kilometers will it cover in two hours? Provide the algorithm, flowchart and Python program you would use to solve the problem.
